name: ARPG Project
description:
An ARPG I made while completing a course. It's hardly a complete game but implements a lot of useful techniques. I made all the particle effects and their textures myself.

(There were cursor indicators that work in my development environment but for some reason don't seem to work when built, so I apologize for any confusion.)

- Click to move and attack. Click on an enemy to begin attacking them automatically.
- 'S' will save the game, anywhere.
- 'L' will load the game, also anywhere.
- 'Backspace' will reset the game.
- 'Esc' will quit the game.

There are three weapons in addition to punching / being unarmed. You can either click on the pickups or run over them.

Pumpkins heal you when picked up.

There's currently no "win" condition, but if you go through and kill the orange guy at the end, that's pretty much it.

If you're checking this out, thanks!

-Alaska
